local_intent: Refine and verify in-plane alignment to the T-shaped block, using detection -> align -> settle -> visual check.
assumptions: Visual confirmation via IsObjectVisible is an adequate quick verification after fine ApproachAndAlign.
A short Wait allows motion to settle before checking visibility.
coherence_with_global: Matches the global plan's re-align-between-pushes step: detect/scan the block, perform tight ApproachAndAlign (tolerance 0.005), then verify before continuing pushes.
